presentation.{presentation.block.one.description}: Young engineer graduated in urban engineering, I am passionate about History, litterature, science and technology in particular.
presentation.{presentation.block.two.description}: In permanent interaction with several professions, from juridical to financial through technical expertise and supplier relationships, I also interacted a lot with clients.
presentation.{presentation.block.three.description}: My degree in urban planning allows me to stay vigilant to the needs of the users, who remain the target for any development or deployment of a solution.
presentation.{presentation.block.four.description}: I am curious and voluntary, and I had the opportunity to work on diverse projects related to urban life. Dynamic and smiling, I have good interactions with clients, suppliers and co-workers whom I get to work with.
presentation.{presentation.block.five.description}: The new needs that are born with digital technologies force us to question what we consider as granted, and a new world is being created! My professional experiences led me to work with domains related to street lighting, but the innovation part always allowed me to get out of this frame and explore new areas. I built a strong understanding and acquired skills in computer science, with several trainings related to data analysis, several programming languages and more generally to software design.

contact_form.{form.description.one}: Please fill in this form to contact me.

accomplissements.{achievements.item.seven.description.ite:
In order to practise the theoretical skills I acquired in HTML/CSS and JavaScript, as well as to have an effective communication support for my CV, I decided to builf this website!
This project was divided into three main phases:
the design : website prototype, visual design (UI/UX)
Note : the background graphism was made by Michelli Buzogany Eboli (see her Behance profile)
Project part of the Data Scientist Nanodegree (See Education). Supervised learning classification model of time series data.

The objective of the project was to demonstrate my ability to analyse a large volume of data usnig the Spark framework, and build a model to predict user churn for a music streaming platform called Sparkify.
accomplissements.{achievements.item.six.keyword}: big data, data analysis, vizualisation, python, Spark, prediction, classification, supervised learning
accomplissements.{achievements.item.five.title}: Data science - analysis of the taxi trips in New York in 2018
accomplissements.{achievements.item.five.description.item:
Project part of the Data Scientist Nanodegree (See Education). Data analysis and observation restitution using appropriate visualisation tools.
The objective of the project was to demonstrate my ability to observe, manipulate and transform data from the dataset of my choice.

I chose to analyse part of the dataset of the New York taxi trips for the year 2018 (about 99 millions de points).
My analysis focused on four main axes:
Can we see trends in the flow of passengers in 2018?
Is there a difference on holidays, hottest or coldest day of the year?
Is there a difference between weekdays and weekends?
Depending on the zone we look at, where are people most likely to come from? To go to? Is it different between weekdays and weekends?

passions.{passions.item.one.description}: Mainly what allows task automation, interaction between systems and people (networks, IoT, human-machine interface among other)
passions.{passions.item.one.why}: Because the world is changing and evolving, and because innovation make us question our relationships with others and with our environment
passions.{passions.item.two.description}:
Sports : yoga, meditation, walking, fitness
Music : violin
Manual activities : embroidery, knitting, sewing
passions.{passions.item.two.why}: Because it is important for the mood, to evacuate stress, to be healthy, to challenge myself, and for all the known benefits on focus, work preparation (rigor, precision), and patience
passions.{passions.item.three.description}:
Historical novels (naturalists), biographies, historical analysis, French or foreign litterature
Historical period from the XVIII-XIX centuries, in France, the West and around the world
passions.{passions.item.three.why}: Because it is an immense source of knowledge to explore, a way to see the world and its history, to understand the world we live in
